definitions.definition: A flush like one produced by such a fever.
Denoting a type of fever accompanying consumption and similar wasting diseases, characterised by flushed cheeks and dry skin.
Pertaining to or symptomatic of such a fever.
Very busy with activity and confusion; feverish.
definitions.example: The city center is so hectic at 8 in the morning that I go to work an hour beforehand to avoid the crowds
